Package com.nexmo.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NexmoCallEventListener
    A NexmoCallEventListener dispatch an events with respect to a NexmoCall.
    NexmoConversationListener
    A NexmoConversationListener dispatch an events with respect to a NexmoConversation.
    NexmoCustomEventListener
    A NexmoCustomEventListener dispatch NexmoCustomEvent with respect to a NexmoConversation.
    NexmoDTMFEventListener
    A NexmoDTMFEventListener dispatch NexmoDTMFEvent with respect to a NexmoConversation.
    NexmoIncomingCallListener
    A NexmoIncomingCallListener dispatch NexmoCall with respect to a NexmoClient.
    NexmoLegStatusEventListener
    A NexmoLegStatusEventListener dispatch NexmoLegStatusEvent with respect to a NexmoConversation.
    NexmoMediaActionEventListener
    A NexmoMediaActionEventListener dispatch NexmoMediaActionEvent with respect to a NexmoConversation.
    NexmoMediaEventListener
    A NexmoMediaEventListener dispatch NexmoMediaEvent with respect to a NexmoConversation.
    NexmoMemberEventListener
    A NexmoMemberEventListener dispatch NexmoMemberEvent with respect to a NexmoConversation.
    NexmoMessageEventListener
    A NexmoMessageEventListener dispatch NexmoEvent with respect to a NexmoConversation.
    NexmoPushEventListener
    A NexmoPushEventListener dispatch NexmoEvent with respect to a NexmoClient.
    NexmoReceiveConversationListener
    A NexmoReceiveConversationListener dispatch NexmoCall with respect to a NexmoClient.
    NexmoTypingEventListener
    A NexmoTypingEventListener dispatch NexmoTypingEvent with respect to a NexmoConversation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Defaults
    Defaults.
    NexmoAttachmentEvent
    Attachment events can be sent to a NexmoConversation:
    NexmoCall
    A NexmoCall object is a NexmoConversation for phone calls, created by NexmoClient.call(String, NexmoCallHandler, NexmoRequestListener), or received from NexmoIncomingCallListener.onIncomingCall(NexmoCall).
    NexmoCallMember
    A NexmoMember inside a Call is called a NexmoCallMember.
    NexmoChannel
    NexmoChannel is how the user connects to the NexmoConversation
    NexmoClient
    You use a NexmoClient instance the NexmoConversation API in your application.
    NexmoClient.Builder
    the builder to initiate the SDK
    NexmoClient.NexmoClientConfig
    the settings to initialise the SDK (has to be built by Builder)
    NexmoConversation
    Create conversations NexmoClient.newConversation(String, String, NexmoRequestListener).
    NexmoConversationsPage
    NexmoConversationPage is the response for NexmoClient.getConversations(Integer, NexmoPageOrder, NexmoRequestListener).
    NexmoCustomEvent
    NexmoCustomEvent dispatched into NexmoCustomEventListener.
    NexmoDeletedEvent
    Deleted events are sent with NexmoTextEvent.delete(NexmoRequestListener) and NexmoAttachmentEvent.delete(NexmoRequestListener).
    NexmoDeliveredEvent
    Delivered receipt events available for NexmoTextEvent and NexmoAttachmentEvent.
    NexmoDirection
    Directional Data from CS (type and extra properties)
    NexmoDTMFEvent
    NexmoDTMFEvent dispatched into NexmoDTMFEventListener.
    NexmoEvent
    NexmoEvent is a foundation for different types of messages.
    NexmoEventsPage
    NexmoEventsPage is the response for NexmoConversation.getEvents(Integer, NexmoPageOrder, String, NexmoRequestListener).
    NexmoImageRepresentation
    Each NexmoAttachmentEvent is defined by 3 Image Representations: NexmoImageRepresentation.TYPE.ORIGINAL, NexmoImageRepresentation.TYPE.ORIGINAL and NexmoImageRepresentation.TYPE.THUMBNAIL.
    NexmoInitiator
    NexmoInitiator is the initiator of the member to a specific NexmoMemberState inside a NexmoConversation
    NexmoLeg
    NexmoLeg is the media stream id in a NexmoConversation
    NexmoMedia
    NexmoMedia is the media state of a NexmoMember in a NexmoConversation
    NexmoMediaActionEvent
    NexmoMediaActionEvent dispatched into NexmoMediaActionEventListener.
    NexmoMediaEvent
    NexmoMediaEvent dispatched into NexmoMediaEventListener.
    NexmoMember
    An individual user (i.e.
    NexmoMemberEvent
    NexmoMember related events are sent when members are NexmoMemberState.INVITED, NexmoMemberState.JOINED and NexmoMemberState.LEFT.
    NexmoSeenEvent
    Seen receipt events available for NexmoTextEvent and NexmoAttachmentEvent.
    NexmoTextEvent
    Text events can be sent to a NexmoConversation:
    NexmoTypingEvent
    Typing events: ON/OFF are sent with NexmoConversation.startTyping() and NexmoConversation.stopTyping().
    NexmoUser
    A user is a person associated with your Nexmo Application.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    NexmoCallHandler
    NexmoCallHandler an enum to represent call types
    NexmoCallMemberStatus
    NexmoCallMemberStatus associated to a NexmoCallMember and represent the member's current call status
    NexmoChannelType
    NexmoChannelType associated to a NexmoMember.
    NexmoConnectionState
    NexmoConnectionState associated to a NexmoConnectionListener and represents the connection status.
    NexmoDirection.Type
    Type associated to a NexmoDirection
    NexmoEventType
    NexmoEventType associated to a NexmoEvent and represent the type of the event.
    NexmoImageRepresentation.TYPE
    NexmoImageRepresentation
    NexmoMediaActionState  
    NexmoMediaActionType  
    NexmoMediaState  
    NexmoMediaType  
    NexmoMemberState  
    NexmoMemberUpdatedType
    NexmoMemberUpdatedType represents the different types of updates to a NexmoMember.
    NexmoPageOrder
    NexmoPageOrder represents the order of the NexmoConversationsPage or NexmoEventsPage.
    NexmoTypingState

    Exception Description
    NexmoClientException  
    NexmoClientExceptionAlreadyBuilt
